channel.title: ::players command
channel.description:
ok heres what i need help with.
currently whenever i type my ::players command it shows howmany players are online in the chatbox like this:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/playeramount.jpg[/img]
what i instead want to edit is to make it show their usernames in a popup scroll thingie like this:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/popupimagehelp.jpg[/img]
if some1 could plz help me with this it would be greatly appreciated thanks!
